::: Black Aracnia rises, smoke steaming from her broke body. She looks to her 
shot her and with a fury fires off Three missles at Sixshot. :::

::: Mairne, face down and with a broken ark, rises and with his missle 
launcher fires two direct shots at Anubis, and then used his working eyes to 
blast an optic shot at Sixshot. :::

::: Rampage, barely able to walk and gurgleing something, in his tank mode, 
fires off missles like an assembly line at Shuko. ::

::: Gremlin, face plate bent, fires his assult riffle at Hades, and then with 
his teeth rips a pin from a small grenade and throws it. :::

::: Jackle pistol whips serpentor, and side kicks the bot in the ribs, hard. 
:::

::: Transanulas, infuriated, sends out a batch of cluster missle from his 
shoulders.  The scream in the air as they all direct themselfs and close in 
on Unitron.

::: Scourge, flying through the air uses a machine gun and sends a spitfire 
of flame and bullets at Shuko. :::

::: The autogun, the remaining ones, continue to fire shots at the 
invaders. :::
